org.biohipi.image.io

Interface ImageDecoder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DicomCodec, JpegCodec, NiftiCodec, PngCodec, RasterCodec

    public interface ImageDecoder
    Interface for decoding a BioHipiImageHeader and BioHipiImage from a Java InputStream.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BioHipiImageHeader decodeHeader(InputStream inputStream)
      Read and decode header for image accessed through a Java InputStream.
      BioHipiImage decodeHeaderAndImage(InputStream inputStream)
      Read and decode both image header and image pixel data from a Java InputStream.
      BioHipiImage decodeImage(InputStream inputStream, BioHipiImageHeader imageHeader)
      Read and decode image from a Java InputStream.

    • Method Detail

      • decodeHeader

        BioHipiImageHeader decodeHeader(InputStream inputStream)
                         throws IOException
        Read and decode header for image accessed through a Java InputStream.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - input stream containing serialized image data
        Returns:
        image header data represented as a BioHipiImageHeader
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error is encountered while reading from input stream

      • decodeImage

        BioHipiImage decodeImage(InputStream inputStream,
                         BioHipiImageHeader imageHeader)
                  throws IllegalArgumentException,
                         IOException
        Read and decode image from a Java InputStream.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - input stream containing serialized image data
        imageHeader - image header that was previously initialized
        imageFactory - factory object capable of creating objects of desired HipiImage type
        Returns:
        image represented as a BioHipiImage
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if parameters are invalid or do not agree with image data
        IOException - if an error is encountered while reading from the input stream

      • decodeHeaderAndImage

        BioHipiImage decodeHeaderAndImage(InputStream inputStream)
                           throws IOException,
                                  IllegalArgumentException
        Read and decode both image header and image pixel data from a Java InputStream. Both of these decoded objects can be accessed through the BioHipiImage object returned by this method.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - input stream containing serialized image data
        imageFactory - factory object capable of creating objects of desired HipiImage type
        Returns:
        image represented as a BioHipiImage
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if parameters are invalid
        IOException - if an error is encountered while reading from the input stream
